verses.verse: In the five<WH2568> and twentieth<WH6242> year<WH8141> of our captivity,<WH1546> in the beginning<WH7218> of the year,<WH8141> in the tenth<WH6218> day of the month,<WH2320> in the fourteenth<WH702> year<WH8141> after<WH310> that the city<WH5892> was struck,<WH5221> in the same<WH6106> day,<WH3117> the hand<WH3027> of Yahweh<WH3068> was on me,<WH935> and he brought me there.

In the visions<WH4759> of God<WH430> brought<WH935> he me into the land<WH776> of Israel,<WH3478> and set<WH5117> me down on a very<WH3966> high<WH1364> mountain,<WH2022> whereon was as it were the frame<WH4011> of a city<WH5892> on the south.<WH5045>

He brought<WH935> me there;<WH376> and, behold, there was a man, whose appearance<WH4758> was like the appearance<WH4758> of brass,<WH5178> with a line<WH6616> of flax<WH6593> in his hand,<WH3027> and a measuring<WH4060> reed;<WH7070> and he stood<WH5975> in the gate.<WH8179>

The man<WH376> said<WH1696> to me,<WH1121> Son of man,<WH120> see<WH7200> with your eyes,<WH5869> and hear<WH8085> with your ears,<WH241> and set<WH7760> your heart<WH3820> on all that I shall show<WH7200> you;<WH4616> for, to the intent that I may show<WH7200> them to you,<WH935> you are brought here:<WH5046> declare all that you see<WH7200> to the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>

Behold,<WH2346> a wall on the outside<WH2351> of the house<WH1004> all around,<WH5439> and in the man<WH376>'s hand<WH3027> a measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070> six<WH8337> cubits<WH520> long,<WH520> of a cubit and a handbreadth<WH2948> each:<WH4058> so he measured the thickness<WH2948> of the building,<WH1146> one<WH259> reed;<WH7070> and the height,<WH6967> one<WH259> reed.<WH7070>

Then came<WH935> he to the gate<WH8179> which looks<WH6440> toward<WH1870> the east,<WH6921> and went up<WH5927> its steps:<WH4609> and he measured<WH4058> the threshold<WH5592> of the gate,<WH8179> one<WH259> reed<WH7070> broad;<WH7341> and the other<WH259> threshold,<WH5592> one<WH259> reed<WH7070> broad.<WH7341>

Every lodge<WH8372> was one<WH259> reed<WH7070> long,<WH753> and one<WH259> reed<WH7070> broad;<WH7341> and the space between the lodges<WH8372> was five<WH2568> cubits;<WH520> and the threshold<WH5592> of the gate<WH8179> by<WH681> the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> toward<WH1004> the house was one<WH259> reed.<WH7070>
He measured<WH4058> also the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> toward<WH1004> the house,<WH259> one reed.<WH7070>

Then measured<WH4058> he the porch<WH197> of the gate,<WH8179> eight<WH8083> cubits;<WH520> and its posts,<WH352> two<WH8147> cubits;<WH520> and the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> was toward the house.<WH1004>

The lodges<WH8372> of the gate<WH8179> eastward<WH1870> were three<WH7969> on this side,<WH6311> and three<WH7969> on that side;<WH6311> they three<WH7969> were of one<WH259> measure:<WH4060> and the posts<WH352> had one<WH259> measure on this side and on that side.<WH4060>
He measured<WH4058> the breadth<WH7341> of the opening<WH6607> of the gate,<WH8179> ten<WH6235> cubits;<WH520> and the length<WH753> of the gate,<WH8179> thirteen<WH7969> cubits;<WH520>

and a border<WH1366> before<WH6440> the lodges,<WH8372> one<WH259> cubit<WH520> on this side,<WH1366> and a border, one cubit<WH520> on that side;<WH8372> and the lodges, six<WH8337> cubits<WH520> on this side,<WH8337> and six cubits on that side.<WH520>

He measured<WH4058> the gate<WH8179> from the roof<WH1406> of the one lodge<WH8372> to the roof<WH1406> of the other,<WH7341> a breadth of twenty<WH6242> - five<WH2568> cubits;<WH520> door<WH6607> against door.<WH6607>
He made<WH6213> also posts,<WH352> sixty<WH8346> cubits;<WH520> and the court<WH2691> reached to the posts,<WH352> around<WH5439> the gate.<WH8179>
From the forefront<WH6440> of the gate<WH8179> at the entrance<WH2978> to the forefront<WH6440> of the inner<WH6442> porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> were fifty<WH2572> cubits.<WH520>

There were closed<WH331> windows<WH2474> to the lodges,<WH8372> and to their posts<WH352> within<WH6441> the gate<WH8179> all around,<WH5439> and likewise to the arches;<WH361> and windows<WH2474> were around<WH5439> inward;<WH6441> and on each post<WH352> were palm trees.<WH8561>

Then brought<WH935> he me into the outer<WH2435> court;<WH2691> and behold,<WH3957> there were rooms and a pavement,<WH7531> made<WH6213> for the court<WH2691> all around:<WH5439> thirty<WH7970> rooms<WH3957> were on the pavement.<WH7531>
The pavement<WH7531> was by the side<WH3802> of the gates,<WH8179> answerable<WH5980> to the length<WH753> of the gates,<WH8179> even the lower<WH8481> pavement.<WH7531>

Then he measured<WH4058> the breadth<WH7341> from the forefront<WH6440> of the lower<WH8481> gate<WH8179> to the forefront<WH6440> of the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> outside,<WH2351> one hundred<WH3967> cubits,<WH520> both on the east<WH6921> and on the north.<WH6828>
The gate<WH8179> of the outer<WH2435> court<WH2691> whose prospect<WH6440> is toward<WH1870> the north,<WH6828> he measured<WH4058> its length<WH753> and its breadth.<WH7341>

The lodges<WH8372> of it were three<WH7969> on this side and three<WH7969> on that side;<WH352> and its posts and its arches<WH361> were after the measure<WH4060> of the first<WH7223> gate:<WH8179> its length<WH753> was fifty<WH2572> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> twenty<WH520> - five cubits.

The windows<WH2474> of it,<WH361> and its arches, and the palm trees<WH8561> of it,<WH4060> were after the measure of the gate<WH8179> whose prospect<WH6440> is toward<WH1870> the east;<WH6921> and they went up<WH5927> to it by seven<WH7651> steps;<WH4609> and its arches<WH361> were before them.<WH6440>

There was a gate<WH8179> to the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> over against the other gate,<WH8179> both on the north<WH6828> and on the east;<WH6921> and he measured<WH4058> from gate<WH8179> to gate<WH8179> one hundred<WH3967> cubits.<WH520>

He led<WH3212> me toward<WH1870> the south;<WH1864> and behold,<WH8179> a gate toward<WH1870> the south:<WH1864> and he measured<WH4058> its posts<WH352> and its arches<WH361> according to these measures.<WH4060>

There were windows<WH2474> in it and in its arches<WH361> all around,<WH5439> like those windows:<WH2474> the length<WH753> was fifty<WH2572> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> twenty<WH6242> - five<WH2568> cubits.<WH520>

There were seven<WH7651> steps<WH4609> to go up<WH5930> to it,<WH361> and its arches were before<WH6440> them;<WH8561> and it had palm trees, one<WH259> on this side,<WH259> and another on that side,<WH352> on its posts.

There was a gate<WH8179> to the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> toward<WH1870> the south:<WH1864> and he measured<WH4058> from gate<WH8179> to gate<WH8179> toward<WH1870> the south<WH1864> a hundred<WH3967> cubits.<WH520>
Then he brought<WH935> me to the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> by the south<WH1864> gate:<WH8179> and he measured<WH4058> the south<WH1864> gate<WH8179> according to these measures;<WH4060>

and its lodges,<WH8372> and its posts,<WH352> and its arches,<WH361> according to these measures:<WH4060> and there were windows<WH2474> in it and in its arches<WH361> all around;<WH5439> it was fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and twenty<WH6242> - five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> broad.<WH7341>
There were arches<WH361> all around,<WH5439> twenty<WH6242> - five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> broad.<WH7341>
The arches<WH361> of it were toward the outer<WH2435> court;<WH2691> and palm trees<WH8561> were on its posts:<WH352> and the ascent<WH4608> to it had eight<WH8083> steps.<WH4609>
He brought<WH935> me into the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> toward<WH1870> the east:<WH6921> and he measured<WH4058> the gate<WH8179> according to these measures;<WH4060>

and its lodges,<WH8372> and its posts,<WH352> and its arches,<WH361> according to these measures:<WH4060> and there were windows<WH2474> therein and in its arches<WH361> all around;<WH5439> it was fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and twenty<WH6242> - five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> broad.<WH7341>

The arches<WH361> of it were toward the outer<WH2435> court;<WH2691> and palm trees<WH8561> were on its posts,<WH352> on this side,<WH4608> and on that side: and the ascent to it had eight<WH8083> steps.<WH4609>
He brought<WH935> me to the north<WH6828> gate:<WH8179> and he measured<WH4058> it according to these measures;<WH4060>

its lodges,<WH8372> its posts,<WH352> and its arches:<WH361> and there were windows<WH2474> therein all around;<WH5439> the length<WH753> was fifty<WH2572> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> twenty<WH6242> - five<WH2568> cubits.<WH520>

The posts<WH352> of it were toward the outer<WH2435> court;<WH2691> and palm trees<WH8561> were on its posts,<WH352> on this side,<WH4608> and on that side: and the ascent to it had eight<WH8083> steps.<WH4609>
A room<WH3957> with its door<WH6607> was by the posts<WH352> at the gates;<WH8179> there they washed<WH1740> the burnt offering.<WH5930>

In the porch<WH197> of the gate<WH8179> were two<WH8147> tables<WH7979> on this side,<WH7979> and two tables on that side,<WH7819> to kill thereon the burnt offering<WH5930> and the sin offering<WH2403> and the trespass offering.<WH817>

On the one side<WH3802> outside,<WH2351> as one goes up<WH5927> to the entry<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> toward the north,<WH6828> were two<WH8147> tables;<WH7979> and on the other<WH312> side,<WH3802> which belonged to the porch<WH197> of the gate,<WH8179> were two<WH8147> tables.<WH7979>

Four<WH702> tables<WH7979> were on this side,<WH702> and four tables<WH7979> on that side,<WH3802> by the side of the gate;<WH8179> eight<WH8083> tables,<WH7979> whereupon they killed the sacrifices.<WH7819>

There were four<WH702> tables<WH7979> for the burnt offering,<WH5930> of cut<WH1496> stone,<WH68> a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> long,<WH753> and a cubit<WH520> and a half<WH2677> broad,<WH7341> and one<WH259> cubit<WH520> high;<WH1363> whereupon they laid<WH3240> the instruments<WH3627> with which they killed<WH7819> the burnt offering<WH5930> and the sacrifice.<WH2077>
The hooks,<WH8240> a<WH259> handbreadth<WH2948> long,<WH3559> were fastened within<WH1004> all around:<WH5439> and on the tables<WH7979> was the flesh<WH1320> of the offering.<WH7133>

Outside<WH2351> of the inner<WH6442> gate<WH8179> were rooms<WH3957> for the singers<WH7891> in the inner<WH6442> court,<WH2691> which was at the side<WH3802> of the north<WH6828> gate;<WH8179> and their prospect<WH6440> was toward<WH1870> the south;<WH1864> one<WH259> at the side<WH3802> of the east<WH6921> gate<WH8179> having the prospect<WH6440> toward<WH1870> the north.<WH6828>
He said<WH1696> to me,<WH2090> This room,<WH3957> whose prospect<WH6440> is toward<WH1870> the south,<WH1864> is for the priests,<WH3548> the keepers<WH8104> of the duty<WH4931> of the house;<WH1004>

and the room<WH3957> whose prospect<WH6440> is toward<WH1870> the north<WH6828> is for the priests,<WH3548> the keepers<WH8104> of the duty<WH4931> of the altar:<WH4196> these are the sons<WH1121> of Zadok,<WH6659> who from among the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878> come near<WH7131> to Yahweh<WH3068> to minister to him.<WH8334>

He measured<WH4058> the court,<WH2691> one hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> long,<WH753> and a hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> broad,<WH7341> foursquare;<WH7251> and the altar<WH4196> was before<WH6440> the house.<WH1004>

Then he brought<WH935> me to the porch<WH197> of the house,<WH1004> and measured<WH4058> each post<WH352> of the porch,<WH197> five<WH2568> cubits<WH520> on this side,<WH2568> and five cubits<WH520> on that side:<WH7341> and the breadth of the gate<WH8179> was three<WH7969> cubits<WH520> on this side,<WH7969> and three cubits on that side.<WH520>

The length<WH753> of the porch<WH197> was twenty<WH6242> cubits,<WH520> and the breadth<WH7341> eleven<WH6249> cubits;<WH520> even by the steps<WH4609> by which they went up<WH5927> to it:<WH5982> and there were pillars by the posts,<WH352> one<WH259> on this side,<WH259> and another on that side.
